Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Leaf \Leaf\, Leaf out \Leaf out\(l[=e]f), v. i. [imp. & p. p. {Leafed} (l[=e]ft); p. pr. & vb. n. {Leafing}.] To shoot out leaves; to produce leaves; to leave; as, the trees leaf in May. --Sir T. Browne. [1913 Webster]
leafing n : (botany) the process of forming leaves [syn: {foliation}]
